channel.title: How can you make your own client?
channel.description: how can you make your own client like silabs or moparscape? do i need to download something, because i would really like to edit my own.

item.title: How can you make your own client?
item.dc:creator: @Hcspure Hcspure
item.description:
@Hcspure wrote:

^^ Help full? Not?

Go to the downloads section

Download a CLIENT NOT SERVER

Make sure its open source

Go to client.java use CTRL + F [FIND] To look for what you want to change

Close that and compile

To change the header of the Client

Go to Frame.java and Change it there its like the 5th line down

If you release, Give credits to base, MOST! :]

Read full topic
item.source: How can you make your own client?
